To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private LadderBottom _ladderbottom;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_ladderbottom = LadderBottom(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_ladderbottom.IsReady)
{
    var current = _ladderbottom.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.ladderbottom = self.LadderBottom(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.ladderbottom.IsReady:
    current = self.ladderbottom.Current.Value
